AD_Havkelaag_SeesGithEgg.synopsis: Behavior AD for Havkelaag for when it sees the gith egg in case plaeyrs drop it from the inventory.
AD_Havkelaag_SeesGithEgg.how_to_trigger: - CTY_Main_A - Drop the gith egg in front of Havkelaag

SocietyMember_01.synopsis: SoB member one-liner: Doctor Moorcombe, an expert on myconids who is suffering withdrawal from the fungal spores.
SocietyMember_01.how_to_trigger: - CTY_Main_A- Use debug book to reach the Lodge

SocietyMember_02.synopsis: SoB member one-liner for Delverdenn, a serious mineral detection inventor.
SocietyMember_02.how_to_trigger: - CTY_Main_A- Use debug book to reach the Lodge

SocietyMember_04.synopsis: SoB member one-liner for Professor Limeleech, a pompous scholar.
SocietyMember_04.how_to_trigger: - CTY_Main_A- Use debug book to reach the Lodge

AD_Havkelaag_SeesGithEggAttacked.synopsis: Behavior AD for Havkelaag for when it sees the gith egg attacked by players
AD_Havkelaag_SeesGithEggAttacked.how_to_trigger: - CTY_Main_A - Drop the gith egg in front of Havkelaag- Attack it

SocietyMember_03.how_to_trigger: - CTY_Main_A- Use debug book to reach the Lodge

AD_Havkelaag_SeesGithEggDestroyed.synopsis: AD for Havkelaag for when it sees the gith egg destroyed in case plaeyrs drop it from the inventory.and kill it
AD_Havkelaag_SeesGithEggDestroyed.how_to_trigger: - CTY_Main_A - Drop the gith egg in front of Havkelaag- Destroy the egg

AD_Havkelaag_SeesGithEgg_0.speaker: Havkelaag
AD_Havkelaag_SeesGithEgg_0.text: Why would you refuse to sell it to me? You must have another buyer lined up. Come back when that falls through.

AD_Havkelaag_SeesGithEgg_1.speaker: Havkelaag
AD_Havkelaag_SeesGithEgg_1.text: Eschew barbarism! Embrace civilisation and truth! Sell me that egg. Please.

AD_Havkelaag_SeesGithEgg_2.speaker: Havkelaag
AD_Havkelaag_SeesGithEgg_2.text: That egg's the key to proving my genetic morality theory! Hand it over - but gently.

AD_Havkelaag_SeesGithEgg_3.speaker: Havkelaag
AD_Havkelaag_SeesGithEgg_3.text: Unless you are just opposed to philosophy and truth, you should sell that egg to me. Really, you should.

AD_Havkelaag_SeesGithEgg_4.speaker: Havkelaag
AD_Havkelaag_SeesGithEgg_4.text: That's a gith egg! Is it viable? Give it to me!

AD_Havkelaag_SeesGithEgg_5.speaker: Havkelaag
AD_Havkelaag_SeesGithEgg_5.text: For the sake of scholarship, give me that egg!

SocietyMember_01_1.speaker: Doctor Moorcombe
SocietyMember_01_1.text: Well met! I'm the Society's leading expert on myconid spore telepathy, but I've had to delay my experiments - run out of spores, you see.

SocietyMember_01_0.speaker: Doctor Moorcombe
SocietyMember_01_0.text: I miss them, those myconid spores. Don't feel quite right without them. Probably shouldn't have inhaled them all so quickly. Eh?

SocietyMember_01_2.speaker: Doctor Moorcombe
SocietyMember_01_2.text: I miss my spores. Tried eating some toadstools I got from Bonecloak's, but no good - just made me constipated.

SocietyMember_02_0.speaker: Delverdenn
SocietyMember_02_0.text: So much Underdark strife comes from vying for scarce minerals. I seek to invent new, easier ways to find such ores. From plenty comes peace!

SocietyMember_02_1.speaker: Delverdenn
SocietyMember_02_1.text: Must get back to my plans and diagrams. I'm so close to a solution!

SocietyMember_04_0.speaker: Professor Limeleech
SocietyMember_04_0.text: Once I publish my paper proving that it's just hyena mite infections that make gnolls so angry, I'll be famous!

SocietyMember_04_1.speaker: Professor Limeleech
SocietyMember_04_1.text: I should get to work on my acceptance speech for the Society research prize.

AD_Havkelaag_SeesGithEggAttacked_0.speaker: Havkelaag
AD_Havkelaag_SeesGithEggAttacked_0.text: No! No! STOP! Gods above, you're going to destroy it!

AD_Havkelaag_SeesGithEggAttacked_2.speaker: Havkelaag
AD_Havkelaag_SeesGithEggAttacked_2.text: Watch it! The outcome of years of research depends on that egg!

SocietyMember_03_0.speaker: Lorlarrio
SocietyMember_03_0.text: I'm compiling a translation dictionary so warring species of the Underdark can understand each other. It's an essential step forward!

SocietyMember_03_1.speaker: Lorlarrio
SocietyMember_03_1.text: Next, I just need to interview somebody who speaks Classical Meenlock.

AD_Havkelaag_SeesGithEggDestroyed_0.speaker: Havkelaag
AD_Havkelaag_SeesGithEggDestroyed_0.text: What a tragic loss! Now how will my theory be proven? Woe and alas!
